author: tvolkert
msg: Updated build.xml file to index jar files and to fail gracefully if the user is using a non-Sun javac compiler

author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-880 Use maven-remote-resources-plugin to generate required legal files.  Also removes dependency on openjpa-project for maven-eclipse-plugin.

author: kpvdr
msg: Persistent cluster test added which checks for recovery of queue and messages after all nodes in a cluster are killed. Test does not run if no store is loaded.

author: asrabkin
msg: CHUKWA-30.  Remove HDFS flush and connection holding. (Contributed by Jerome Boulon)
